Tucson shakes Perceptor's hand in a friendly gesture.

"Thank you, it's goo=
d to be back.  I couldn't have done it without your help too, Perceptor.  I=
've learned a great lesson myself.  Never lose sight of the comrades who fi=
ght beside you, for there's nothing stronger than an alliance of close frie=
nds, who's hearts reach out to those in need.  I was in need and didn't rea=
lize it until now.  But now that I do, I'm thankful to all of you who helpe=
d me through this ordeal, and helped Rodimus as well.  Speaking of which, I=
'd like to remain here until he is fully functionable.  Just to be sure he'=
s come out of this all right."
